function EP01_14()

    -- .結-2「男として」
    SaveData.Title = "男として"

    -- //BG：ステージ上
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024aa")

    -- //BU：モブ男性、エルメス（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB01aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,falsre)

    PLAY_BGM("BGM05.wav",0)

    MSG([[On the auditorium stage, just as Hermes-san gently tried to lift the man's body――
講堂のステージ上で、エルメスさんが男性の身体を優しく起こし上げようとした次の瞬間――]])

    MSG([[A large number of security guards came charging in from the side of the stage.
ステージの脇から大量の警備員が雪崩れ込んできた。]])

    -- //BU：モブスーツ男×３
    --LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB01aa")
    --LAYER_LOAD(75,"BU_MOB01aa")
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB01aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("guardman_0003.wav")
    MSG([[
【Security Guard】
 “Now! Secure himーーーーーーーーーーー!”
「今だ！　確保ーーーーーーーーーーー！」]])

    MSG([[It seemed they were spying for an opening in the man's defense.
どうやら男性の隙を探っていたようだ。]])

    MSG([[But the timing was terrible. Everything was almost resolved already, but now it’s all ruined.
だけど、タイミングが悪すぎる。
    　既に解決しかけていたのに、すべて台無しだ。]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(75,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- //BU：モブ男性
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG024ae")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_MOB01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask025",300,false)

PLAY_VOICE("delirium_0015.wav")
    MSG([[
【Confused Man】
 “Hermes-chan!!? Did y-you trick meeeeeee?!?!”
「エルメスちゃん！！？！？　オ、オレを騙したのかああああああああ！！？！」]])

PLAY_SE("SEc042.wav")
WAIT(300)

PLAY_VOICE("guardman_0004.wav")
    MSG([[
【Security Guard】
 “Ugh!”
「うぎゃ！」]])

    MSG([[The man quickly grabbed a nearby kitchen knife and slashed at a security guard approaching him. He was confused, thinking Hermes-san had betrayed him.
男性がすぐ足元の包丁を拾い上げ、近づいてきた警備員を斬りつけた。 エルメスさんに騙されたと思って錯乱している。]])

    MSG([[Without hesitation, the man pressed the tip of the knife against his own throat.
男性はそのまま包丁の切っ先を、自らの喉元へと突き立てた。]])

    -- //BU：モブ男性、エルメス（真剣）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB01aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ba")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG024aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0028.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hermes】
Serious “Eugene-san, no!! That’s not cute!!”
真剣
    「ユージンさん、ダメ！！　それは可愛くないッ！！」]])

    MSG([[Hermes-san showed an expression of anger for the first time. Without pause, she brought her face close to the man’s nose and gave him a wink.
初めて怒ったような表情を見せるエルメスさん。 間髪入れず、男性のすぐ鼻先まで自分の顔を近づけて、ウインクをしてみせた。]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0029.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hermes】
Wink “Cute is justice. And not cute is—No no!”
ウインク
    「カワイイは正義。そしてカワイクないは――ノンノンだよ！」]])

    -- //SE：エルメスウインク
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG024ae")
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,-600,100)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_ERU01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask027",300,false)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_ERU01ib")
    ERU_PARTICLE_01(150, 20, -215, 150, 300)

PLAY_VOICE("delirium_0016.wav")
    MSG([[
【Confused Man】
 “Hyaaaah!?”
「ひゃあああー！！？」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    -- //BU：エルメス（ウインク）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_ERU01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask027",500,false)


    -- //BG：大講堂正面
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG020ae")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0083.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
 “Whoa!?”
「うわっ！？」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //SE：床に倒れる音
    PLAY_SE("SEc019.wav")
    WAIT(500)

    MSG([[The man was suddenly blown off the stage.
なんと男性がステージの上から吹き飛ばされた。]])

    MSG([[Like he was caught in an explosion’s blast, he tumbled from the platform right in front of our seats.
まるで爆風にでも巻き込まれたみたいに、壇上からボクらの座席のすぐ目の前にまで転がり落ちてきた。]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0084.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
Worried (No way, did Hermes-san’s wink blow him away!?)
焦り
    （まさか、エルメスさんのウインクが吹き飛ばしたの！？）]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[It’s hard to believe. Sure, a wink that excites close to a thousand people at once, but could it really blow someone away up close...?
流石に信じがたい。
    　一度で千人近くを湧かせるほどのウインクだからって、間近で直視すると吹き飛ぶなんてこと、あるのかな……？]])

    MSG([[That would be magic. Fantasy. But maybe, if it’s Hermes-san, it might be possible.
そんなのもはや魔法だ。ファンタジーだ。
    　だけどもしかしたら、エルメスさんなら可能なのかもしれない。]])

    MSG([[She has that kind of charisma that makes you think so.
そう思わせるだけのカリスマ性が、彼女にはある。]])

    -- //BU：モブ男性
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,0,-400)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("delirium_0017.wav")
    MSG([[
【Confused Man】
 “Aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaah!!!”
「あああああああああああああああああああああああ！！！」]])

    MSG([[The fallen man screamed as he stood up. Staggering and shouting, he headed toward us.
倒れていた男性が絶叫と共に立ち上がった。
    　叫びながら、よろめきながら、男性はコチラへ向かってくる。]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG020aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029",500,false)

    MSG([[――Is he planning to force his way to the exit?!
――出口まで強引に突っ切るつもりか！]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01bb")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0085.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
Serious “Everyone! Please run away!”
真剣
    「皆さん！　逃げてください！」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[I called out to the frightened students around me. Startled by my voice, everyone staggered as they hurried to escape.
怯えている周囲の生徒たちに呼びかけた。
    　ボクの声にハッとして、皆よろよろと逃げていく。]])

    MSG([[Judgment tends to slow in times like this. My mentor once said it’s important for someone to prompt others into action.
こういった時は判断が遅れがち。
    　誰かが行動を促すのが重要だと、いつか師匠が言っていた。]])

    -- //BU：ヒユ（悲しみ）
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BUL_HIY01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0064.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hiyu】
Sad “H-hii...”
悲しみ
    「ひ、ひぃ……」]])

    MSG([[As we passed through the aisle between seats, Hiyu-san hugged my shoulder. I was startled for a moment but managed to endure it and gently smiled back.
席の間の通路を通る途中で、隣のヒユさんがボクの肩へと抱き着いてきた。 一瞬ドキリとしたけれど、何とかこらえて、出来る限り優しく微笑みかける。]])

    MSG([[Back then, I often clung to my sister’s shoulder because I was scared too. I deeply understand how Hiyu-san must be feeling now.
昔はボクもよく怖くて姉さんの肩に抱きついていた。
    　ヒユさんの今の心情は、痛いほどよくわかる。]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0086.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
Smile “You’re too scared to move, aren’t you? It’s okay. I’m here with you.”
笑顔
    「怖くて動けないんですね。大丈夫。私がそばにいますよ」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[Hiyu-san’s body was freezing cold from tension and stiff like ice.
ヒユさんの身体は緊張からか、氷みたいに冷たく、ガチガチに強張っている。]])

    MSG([[Just me, a man, speaking to her caused a strong rejection reaction.
男のボクが話しかけただけでも、激しい拒否反応を示したんだ。]])

    MSG([[If you got snarled at by such a scary man, it’s no wonder you can’t move.
あんなに怖い男性に凄まれたら、動けなくなるのも仕方がない。]])

    MSG([[I’m scared too, but for Hiyu-san’s sake, I can’t run away.
ボクも怖いけれど、ヒユさんのために、逃げるワケにはいかなくなった。]])

    -- //BU：ヒユ（泣き）、モブ男性
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB01aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BUL_HIY01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("delirium_0018.wav")
    MSG([[
【Confused Man】
 “Get out of the wayeeeeeee!!!”
「道をあけろぉぉぉおおおおおおおおッッッ！」]])

PLAY_SE("SEc043.wav")
WAIT(900)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0065.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hiyu】
Sad “Hyu... hyuaaah...”
悲しみ
    「ひゅ……ひゅああ……」]])

    MSG([[The disturbed man swung his knife as he charged toward us. Hiyu-san was trembling with fear and barely able to walk.
変質者の男性が、包丁を振り回しながらコチラへ迫りくる。
    　ヒユさんは恐怖からか、足が震えてろくに歩けそうにない。]])

    -- //BU:エリカのバストアップが【夏服（真剣）】に変化
    -- LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_ERI02ba")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030",300,false)

    --吉　矩形と立ち絵を使いたいが、主人公の立ち絵は使えない？

    MSG([[I stepped forward to shield Hiyu-san. Then, I took off my blazer, wrapped it around my left arm, held that arm forward, and clenched my fist.
ボクはヒユさんをかばうように一歩前に出た。 更に、ブレザーを脱いで左腕に巻きつけ、その腕を前にして、拳を構える。]])

    MSG([[An improvised shield against a bladed weapon. This should prevent the wrist from being cut and avoid a fatal injury... hopefully.
対・刃物戦用の即席の盾だ。
    　これなら、手首を裂かれて、致命傷を負うことはない…はず。]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI02ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0087.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
Summer Uniform・Serious (My mentor said it’d be okay... but I’m still uneasy)
夏服・真剣
    （師匠は大丈夫だって言ってたけど……不安だ）]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[My heart was pounding so wildly I thought it might jump right out of my body. Cold sweat was streaming down relentlessly.
心臓は身体から逃げ出そうとしているのかと思うほど、激しく跳ね回っている。
    　冷や汗がダラダラと流れ続けている。]])

    MSG([[Still, I touched the brooch on my chest and gathered my courage.
それでも、胸のブローチに触れて自分を奮い立たせた。]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI02ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0088.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
Summer Uniform・Serious “This entrance ceremony is the dream of so many girls. I won’t let it be ruined anymore.”
夏服・真剣
    「この入学式は、たくさんの女の子たちの憧れなんだ。これ以上台無しにさせるもんか」]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0089.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
Summer Uniform・Serious “And above all else...”
夏服・真剣
    「それに何より……」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG020aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029",300,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
    LAYER_ALPHA(50,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,255,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-400,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    WAIT(500)

PLAY_VOICE("delirium_0019.wav")
    MSG([[
【Confused Man】
 “Get outta me waaaaayyyyy!!!”
「どけええええええええええええええ！！！」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01ga")
    LAYER_ALPHA(55,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(55,200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,255,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,400,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    WAIT(500)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0066.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hiyu】
Worried “Hyuaaaaaah!?”
焦り
    「ひゅああああああああ！？」]])

    MSG([[The man raised his knife.
男性が包丁を振り上げた。]])

    -- //SE：風を切る音
PLAY_SE("SEc042.wav")

    --吉　剣戟のアニメーションが欲しい……
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask027",100,false)

    MSG([[Bloodshot eyes, the blade descending, Hiyu-san’s scream echoing.
血走った男の目、振り下ろされる包丁の切っ先。
    　響き渡るヒユさんの悲鳴。]])

    -- //CI：015
LAYER_LOAD(50,"CI015a")
LAYER_ALPHA(50,0)
LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,255,500,Ease.OutCubic)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030",500,false)

    MSG([[Summoning courage, I reached out.
勇気を振り絞って手を伸ばす。]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI02bb")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0090.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
Serious “Pointing a weapon at a woman’s face――unforgivable!!!”
真剣
    「女性の顔に刃物を向けるなんて――許せないッ！！！」]])

-- SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029",0,false)
-- LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,1920,0,1000,Ease.OutCubic)
-- LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,1000,Ease.OutCubic)
-- WAIT(1000)
-- LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- //SE：衝撃音
    PLAY_SE("SEc020.wav")
    WAIT(500)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[I caught the knife with my blazer-wrapped left arm. At the same time, I struck the knife-holding wrist with a knife-hand strike.
包丁をブレザーの巻かれた左腕で受け止めた。
    　と同時に、包丁を持つ手の手首に手刀を振り下ろした。]])

    PLAY_SE("SEc025.wav")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask027",100,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG020aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask027",300,false)

    EFFECT_SCREEN(1,30,30,500,false,false)

PLAY_VOICE("delirium_0020.wav")
    MSG([[
【Confused Man】
 “Gyaah!”
「ぎぇ！」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    -- //SE：打撃音
    --PLAY_SE("SEc025.wav")
    --WAIT(500)

    -- //SE：金属音
    PLAY_SE("SEc014.wav")
    --WAIT(500)

    MSG([[The knife slipped from the man’s hand. ――Now is the only chance to neutralize him!
男性の手から包丁がこぼれ落ちた。
    　――無力化するなら今しかない！]])

    MSG([[I slipped into close range, firmly grabbed his defenseless arm and shoulder, and lifted his body with all my strength. I felt his body lifted cleanly into the air.
懐へ潜り込んで、無防備な腕と肩をガッチリと掴んだまま、男性の身体を全力で背負い上げる。 男性の身体がキレイに宙へ持ち上がるのを感じた。]])

    -- //BU：ダリア（驚き）、ウラン（驚き）
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_LOAD(45,"BG020ae")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUS_DAR01ca")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BUS_RYU01ca")
    LAYER_MASK(56,"frame00",45,55)
    LAYER_POSITION(45,800,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(50,1600,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(55,1300,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(56,800,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(45,0,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,800,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,500,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(56,0,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    WAIT(500)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0027.wav")
    MSG([[
【Uran】
Surprised “What a beautiful ippon seoi nage.”
驚き
    「なんて美しい一本背負い」]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0033.wav")
    MSG([[
【Daria】
Surprised “A movement without waste—proof of rigorous training.”
驚き
    「無駄のない動き、鍛錬をよく積んでいる証拠だな」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(45,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_MASK(56,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask025",300,false)

    -- //BU：モブ男性
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB01aa")

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI02bb")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0091.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
Summer Uniform・Serious “Seeyaahhhhh!!!”
夏服・真剣
    「せぇやあああああああっっっ！！！」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("delirium_0021.wav")
    MSG([[
【Confused Man】
 “Gyeeeh!!!”
「ぎえぇぇ！！！」]])

    -- //SE：衝撃音
    PLAY_SE("SEc026.wav")

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG020aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask032",500,false)

    MSG([[I slammed the man’s body into the ground. Then, I quickly tied up his arms with the blazer I took off. It’s a pretty tough blazer, so he definitely can’t get free alone.
そのまま男性の身体を地面へと叩きつけた。 更に、左腕からほどいた上着で、男性の腕を素早く縛り上げる。 なかなか丈夫なブレザーなので、一人では絶対に外せない。]])

    MSG([[It was a close call, but somehow I managed to resolve the situation without anyone getting hurt.
紙一重ではあったけれど、何とか誰も傷つけられずに事態を収められた。]])

PLAY_VOICE("delirium_0022.wav")
    MSG([[
【Confused Man】
 “Uuuuuu… f-for me… there’s only Hermes-chan left…”
「うううぅ……お、オレには……オレにはもう、エルメスちゃんしか……」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI08da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0092.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
Summer Uniform (Blood)・Sad “………………”
夏服（血）・悲しみ
    「………………」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[The man lay face down, murmuring sadly. I think Hermes-san means as much to him as my sister does to me.
男性はうつ伏せのまま、悲しそうにつぶやき続けている。
    　彼にとってのエルメスさんは、ボクにとっての姉さんと同じくらい、大きな存在なんだと思う。]])

    MSG([[What he did is absolutely unforgivable, but... I can’t bring myself to blame him any further.
彼のした行為はとても許されるモノではないけれど……。
    　ボクにはこれ以上責めることはできない。]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI08da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0093.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
Summer Uniform (Blood)・Sad “I truly understand the feeling of clinging to someone important.”
夏服（血）・悲しみ
    「大切なヒトにすがる気持ち、とてもよくわかります」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI08ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0094.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
Summer Uniform (Blood)・Serious “...But you have to deal with your own weakness yourself.”
夏服（血）・真剣
    「……だけど、自分の弱さは自分で何とかするしかないんです」]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0095.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
Summer Uniform (Blood)・Serious “Step by step, moving forward little by little. Crying, struggling, resting, just little by little…”
